QuestData.Title: Jorgensen
QuestData.Description: I don't know where Krakauer or Danforth are, but Jorgensen was being held at Render's Camp, northwest of here. I was in the same crap filled cage with him before they relocated me to Alther's Mill.$B$BIf we're gonna get him out we'll need the key. A stone cold witch from hell known as Utroka the Keymistress holds on tight to that thing. We'll have to kill her if we're going to get Jorgensen's cage key. She's up north in the valley leading to the Burning Steppes.$B$BLet's go, kid.
QuestData.CompletionText: Messner! Damn, it's good to see a friendly face. Get me out of here!
QuestData.RewardText: I know where they're holding Krakauer and Danforth. We gotta hurry. They were prepping those two for a sacrifice!
